challenges.title: Q1: API Gateway
challenges.description: The main role of an API Gateway is to:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Store data permanently
b) Distribute traffic to multiple microservices and handle cross-cutting concerns
c) Render HTML pages directly on client browser
d) Act as a replacement for the database

challenges.title: Q2: Stateless Service
challenges.description: A stateless service is one where:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Server stores user session data in local memory
b) Server does not store any per-session data; each request is independent
c) Server stores all user data in files
d) Server does not use any database at all
